subject: Communication
title: Mirroring: The Simplest De-Escalation Tool
description: A short lesson to help you apply Mirroring: The Simplest De-Escalation Tool.

hook.text: She repeated his last three words back to him as a question. He paused, then explained more calmly. Crisis averted.

buildup.text: Mirroring â€” repeating 1-3 key words the other person said â€” signals listening and encourages them to elaborate.

discovery.text: It works because people in conflict feel unheard. Mirroring proves you're paying attention without judging or advising.

twist.text: FBI negotiators rely heavily on mirroring. It buys time, builds rapport, and gathers information simultaneously.

climax.text: Mirroring is almost absurdly simple, yet studies show it increases negotiation success by 30% or more.

punchline.text: Sometimes the most powerful thing you can say is what they just said.

quiz.question: What does mirroring involve in conflict resolution?
